'''Astrologist Mona Megistus'''<ref name="IA" /><ref name="ARAC" /><ref name="Astrologist" group="Note" /> is a playable {{Hydro}} [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

An astrologist of knowledgeable skill and high pride, Mona has settled in [[Mondstadt]] to avoid suffering the ire of [[Barbeloth|her master]] after unwittingly reading the latter's diary.
